step_content.text:
**This tool will guide you through the Participant Information to help you decide whether to take part in the study.** {#level-id-1}

## This is an H2

When you press START below, each step will be presented in full screen mode to remove distractions.

### This is an H3

If you would prefer your normal view you can change back using the fullscreen button in the header.

Follow the simple step by step process, reading to the bottom of each page before you move on to the next.

When you have viewed all of the steps you can return to the main study website or CONSENT to take part in the study.

image.alt: Illustration of carer and child using a computer to research a trial

Please watch our animation about the study.

step_content.text:
**Thank you for taking the time to read this Participant Information.**

If you are clear that you want to take part in the study please select the SCREENING AND CONSENT button below.

If you need more information please return to the Study Website.

Or if you have any questions get in touch:

Email: trialteam@website.com

Phone: 0123456789

image.alt: Illustration of a doctor and nurse giving the thumbs up

step_content.section_label: Thank you for taking the time to read this Participant Information..
